effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.

short_effect.sun_moon: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, its power is increased.
